data.message: I have seen ed sheeran once before but unfortunatly after standing for hours to get really a really good view a couple, the male being very tall and bulky and the female being tall to begin with but also wearing heels stood right infront of me and my partner. This meant that I couldn't actually see ed sheeran cause i'm pretty short. So it would be amazing to meet him rather than just being able to listen to him and it would blow my partners mind to meet him :)
